name: StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty
description:
StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty is a strategy game. It came out on 27-07-2010. Blizzard Entertainment published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty has a score of 93. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty is available on macOS and PC.
It was produced by Chris Sigaty. It was scored by Derek Duke, Glenn Stafford, Neal Acree and Russell Brower.
